title: Fix the Death Recap
body: For quite some time now Death-recaps been showing substantially less damage to what was done, Just wondering if its going to get fixed soon? I know its not just bugged for me because my friends also have this problem.

replies.body:
Hey Tiatank543,

Thanks for bringing this up. I just played a game and was not able to replicate the issue you are mentioning, and I can't seem to find reference to and issue like this in our system (though I could be wrong).

Are you 100% sure the damage shown is not correct?
Could you provide me with some screenshots/video so I can confirm and send it through to the relevant team.

-ToxicHawk

Formatting op.

These are just a few of the many. I don't take death recaps seriously at all now.

Just gathered some shots of this behaviour. The uploader does not support multiple images at once, so I'll just show the most notable examples.

Remember, I am HORSE OF FORCE.

Wait you're unaware of how messed up the death recap is?

I should start screen-shotting it. There's times where it's like "You dealt 127 true damage TO YOURSELF :D" and other times were Jarvan IV's passive (strangely named "odin_passive") was apparently a minion ("spell not found" is its description). The only time I use death recap is for when I need a giggle.

I've noticed problems with the Death Recap aswell. For some odd reason when you are killed by one of Baron's attacks it's named "baroncorruption" and has the description "Minion baroncorruption"
Surely Riot could have put effort in naming all his attacks, Lol.

A Screenshot of what i stated above is seen in this screenshot: http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=357428164

No I have seen some errors,like you mentioned but (unless I'm misunderstanding), the error Tiatank543 is talking about shows the correct information EXCEPT the damage values are incorrectly calculated.

Please correct me if I'm wrong, and if so Ill look further into what we are doing.
